data.title: A Comprehensive Guide to the Benefits of Migrating from Symantec Vontu DLP to Microsoft Purview DLP
data.meta_description: Data is the lifeblood of any modern business, but it also comes with significant challenges and risks. Data protection is a crucial aspect of any data strategy, ensuring that sensitive information is not leaked, misused, or compromised.
data.text:
Data is the lifeblood of any modern business, but it also comes with significant challenges and risks. Data protection is a crucial aspect of any data strategy, ensuring that sensitive information is not leaked, misused, or compromised. Data loss prevention (DLP) is a key component of data protection, preventing unauthorized access, sharing, or transfer of data that could harm the business or its customers.

However, not all DLP solutions are created equal. Some are more complex, costly, and difficult to manage than others. Some are more integrated, flexible, and scalable than others. Some are more suited to the cloud, hybrid, or on-premise environments than others. Choosing the right DLP solution can make a huge difference in the effectiveness, efficiency, and security of your data protection strategy.

If you are currently using Symantec Vontu DLP, you might be wondering if there is a better alternative. Symantec Vontu is a legacy DLP solution that has been around for a long time, but it also comes with several limitations and challenges, especially for organizations that are using or planning to use Microsoft's cloud services. Symantec Vontu is not fully integrated with Microsoft's ecosystem, requires complex and manual configuration and management, and might not offer the best performance, reliability, and cost-effectiveness for your business.

That's why you should consider migrating to Microsoft Purview DLP, a modern and advanced DLP solution that is designed to work seamlessly with Microsoft's cloud services and offers numerous benefits for your business. Microsoft Purview DLP is a part of Microsoft Purview, a comprehensive data governance service that helps you discover, catalog, classify, and protect your data across your enterprise. Microsoft Purview DLP leverages the power of Microsoft's cloud capabilities, artificial intelligence, and analytics to provide a superior DLP solution that can help you save money, secure data, and simplify data management.

Save Money with Microsoft Purview DLP by migrating from Vontu

One of the main benefits of migrating to Microsoft Purview DLP is the potential cost savings that you can achieve. Microsoft Purview DLP offers a more cost-effective and resource-efficient DLP solution than Symantec Vontu DLP, especially for organizations that have Microsoft E3 or E5 subscriptions. Here are some of the ways that Microsoft Purview DLP can help you save money:

Licensing Costs: If you have Microsoft E3 or E5 subscriptions, you already have access to Microsoft Purview DLP features, which means you don't need to pay additional licensing fees for a separate DLP solution. This can lead to significant savings in the long run, as you can leverage the integrated DLP features that Microsoft provides for its cloud services, such as Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Teams. You can also benefit from other Microsoft 365 security and compliance tools that are included in your subscription, such as Microsoft Defender, Microsoft Information Protection, and Microsoft Compliance Manager.

Migration Costs: Migrating from Symantec Vontu DLP to Microsoft Purview DLP can incur some costs, such as hiring consultants, purchasing new hardware, customizing software, and training users. However, these costs can be minimized by following best practices and leveraging the existing resources and expertise that you have with Microsoft's cloud services. For instance, you can use the pre-built templates and automated policy recommendations that Microsoft Purview DLP provides to speed up the migration process and reduce the need for manual configuration and testing. You can also use the built-in connectors and APIs that Microsoft Purview DLP offers to integrate with your existing systems, such as Splunk, Microsoft Sentinel, and ServiceNow, without requiring substantial redevelopment efforts.

Training Costs: The learning curve for Microsoft Purview DLP is much lower than that of Symantec Vontu DLP, as Microsoft Purview DLP has a more intuitive and user-friendly interface that simplifies the configuration and management of DLP policies. This means that you can reduce the training costs and time required for your administrators and users to become proficient with the new system. You can also leverage the extensive documentation and support that Microsoft provides for its cloud services, as well as the online community and forums that can help you with any questions or issues that you might encounter.

Resource Efficiency: Microsoft Purview DLP enables you to optimize your IT resources by centralizing and simplifying the management of DLP policies across your enterprise. You can manage all your policies from a single interface, reducing the complexity and overhead of maintaining multiple systems and consoles. You can also benefit from the automation and machine learning capabilities that Microsoft Purview DLP provides, such as proactive policy recommendations, automated incident response, and advanced analytics and reporting. These features can help you identify and mitigate risks more effectively, streamline workflows, and free up valuable IT staff time for higher-priority tasks.

Secure Data with Microsoft Purview DLP

Another major benefit of migrating to Microsoft Purview DLP is the enhanced data security that you can achieve. Microsoft Purview DLP offers a more robust and comprehensive DLP solution than Symantec Vontu DLP, especially for organizations that are using or planning to use Microsoft's cloud services. Here are some of the ways that Microsoft Purview DLP can help you secure data:

Data Discovery and Classification: Microsoft Purview DLP leverages the data discovery and classification capabilities of Microsoft Purview, which helps you scan and catalog your data across your enterprise, including on-premise, cloud, and hybrid environments. You can use Microsoft Purview to automatically or manually classify your data based on its sensitivity, such as confidential, personal, or public. You can also use Microsoft Purview to apply labels and metadata to your data, such as retention policies, encryption keys, or access permissions. These features help you gain visibility and control over your data, enabling you to apply appropriate DLP policies and protect your data accordingly.

Policy and Rule Translation: Microsoft Purview DLP provides a variety of pre-built templates for common DLP policies, such as GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS, which you can use to quickly deploy policies that adhere to industry standards and best practices. You can also customize these templates or create your own policies based on your specific business needs and compliance requirements. Microsoft Purview DLP uses a flexible and powerful mechanism for defining and enforcing policies, which allows you to translate your existing rules and policies from Symantec Vontu DLP without losing functionality or coverage. You can also use the automated policy recommendations that Microsoft Purview DLP provides to enhance your policies and address any gaps or risks that you might have.

Structured Information Types (SITs) with Exact Data Matching (EDM): Microsoft Purview DLP supports SITs with EDM, which is a feature that allows you to detect and protect structured information types, such as credit card numbers, social security numbers, or bank account numbers, using exact data matching logic. This feature helps you prevent the leakage of sensitive data that might not be detected by regular expressions or keywords. Microsoft Purview DLP allows you to configure SITs with EDM using a similar process as Symantec Vontu DLP, ensuring that you can maintain the same level of detection accuracy and performance. You can also use Microsoft Purview DLP to ingest data from various sources, such as databases, files, or APIs, and ensure that they are compatible with the EDM logic.

Endpoint Protection: Microsoft Purview DLP integrates with Microsoft Defender, Microsoft's endpoint protection solution, to provide comprehensive protection for your devices, such as laptops, desktops, tablets, and smartphones. You can use Microsoft Defender to enforce DLP policies on your endpoints, preventing unauthorized access, sharing, or transfer of data from your devices. You can also use Microsoft Defender to monitor and remediate any threats or incidents that might affect your endpoints, such as malware, ransomware, or phishing attacks.

Data Security: Microsoft Purview DLP ensures that your data remains secure during and after the migration process, using Microsoft's cloud security features and best practices. You can use Microsoft Purview DLP to encrypt your data in transit and at rest, using Microsoft's encryption keys or your own keys. You can also use Microsoft Purview DLP to audit and monitor your data activities, using Microsoft's logging and reporting tools, such as Power BI, Splunk, or Microsoft Sentinel. These features help you maintain data integrity and consistency, as well as comply with any regulatory or audit requirements.

Simplify Data Management with Microsoft Purview DLP

A third benefit of migrating to Microsoft Purview DLP is the simplified data management that you can achieve. Microsoft Purview DLP offers a more integrated and streamlined DLP solution than Symantec Vontu DLP, especially for organizations that are using or planning to use Microsoft's cloud services. Here are some of the ways that Microsoft Purview DLP can help you simplify data management:

Centralized and Simplified Management: Microsoft Purview DLP offers a centralized management console, which allows you to configure and manage DLP policies across your enterprise from a single interface. You can use the intuitive and user-friendly interface of Microsoft Purview DLP to create, modify, and deploy DLP policies with ease, reducing the complexity and overhead of maintaining multiple systems and consoles. You can also use the pre-built templates and automated policy recommendations that Microsoft Purview DLP provides to simplify the policy creation and deployment process, as well as the advanced analytics and reporting tools that Microsoft Purview DLP offers to measure and improve the policy effectiveness and efficiency.

Integration with Existing Systems: Microsoft Purview DLP integrates smoothly with your existing systems, such as incident management, SIEM, and IT service management solutions, through built-in connectors and APIs. You can use these integrations to send DLP logs and incidents from Microsoft Purview DLP to your other systems, such as Splunk, Microsoft Sentinel, or ServiceNow, for advanced analysis and correlation with other security events. You can also use these integrations to automate and streamline your incident response and management workflows, such as creating playbooks, tickets, or alerts, based on the DLP incidents detected by Microsoft Purview DLP.

Integration with Microsoft's Ecosystem: Microsoft Purview DLP integrates seamlessly with Microsoft's ecosystem, which includes Microsoft's cloud services and other Microsoft 365 security and compliance tools. You can use this integration to leverage the DLP features that Microsoft provides for its cloud services, such as Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Teams, ensuring consistent and comprehensive protection for your data across your enterprise. You can also use this integration to benefit from the other Microsoft 365 security and compliance tools that are included in your subscription, such as Microsoft Defender, Microsoft Information Protection, and Microsoft Compliance Manager, creating a more cohesive and holistic data protection strategy.

User Training and Change Management: Microsoft Purview DLP reduces the learning curve and the resistance to change that you might face when migrating from Symantec Vontu DLP, as Microsoft Purview DLP has a more intuitive and user-friendly interface that simplifies the configuration and management of DLP policies. You can also leverage the extensive documentation and support that Microsoft provides for its cloud services, as well as the online community and forums that can help you with any questions or issues that you might encounter. These factors can help you reduce the training costs and time required for your administrators and users to become proficient with the new system, as well as increase the adoption rates and satisfaction levels.

Think About It!

Microsoft Purview DLP is a modern and advanced DLP solution that is designed to work seamlessly with Microsoft's cloud services and offers numerous benefits for your business. Microsoft Purview DLP can help you save money, secure data, and simplify data management, compared to Symantec Vontu DLP, which is a legacy DLP solution that has several limitations and challenges. By migrating to Microsoft Purview DLP, you can achieve a more cost-effective, robust, and comprehensive data protection strategy, ensuring compliance and security in the evolving digital landscape.
